sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
    View,
    Text,
    Button,
    StyleSheet,
    ScrollView,
    Image,
    TouchableOpacity
} from "react-native";
import branch1 from '../assets/image/branch1.png';
import bubble from '../assets/icons/bubble.png';

const Shop1 = ({navigation}) => {
    return (
        <ScrollView style={{backgroundColor: '#01BCE4'}}>
            <View>
                <View style={{ height: 15, backgroundColor: '#01BCE4'}}>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.imgShape}>
                        <Image style={styles.img} source={branch1}/>
                    </View>
                <View style={{ height: 15, backgroundColor: '#01BCE4'}}>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.mainTextContainer}>
                    <View style={styles.shapeTextContainer}>
                        <Text style={{
                            color: 'black',
                            fontSize: 50,
                            fontWeight: '800',
                            }}>
                                Laundry Shop 1
                        </Text>
                        <View style={styles.description}>
                            <View style={{
                                left: 10,
                                height:200,
                                width: 20,
                                backgroundColor: '#01BCE4',
                                borderRadius:20,
                            }}>
                            </View>
                            <Text style={{left: 30}}>
                            lorem epsium
                            </Text>
                        </View>

                        <View style={styles.scheduleContainer}>
                            <Image/>
                            <Text>

                            </Text>

                        </View>
                        
                        
                    </View>
                    {/* For button 'book' */}
                    <TouchableOpacity>
                        <View>

                        </View>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>

                <View style={[{ 
                    width: "100%",
                     }]}>
                
                    <Button
                        color="blue"
                        title="Book"
                        onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Shop1Menu')}
                    />
                </View>
               
            </View>
        </ScrollView>
    )
}
const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    imgShape: {
        backgroundColor:'white',
        borderRadius:20,
        alignContent: 'center',
        alignSelf: 'center', 
        paddingTop:30,
        paddingHorizontal: 20,
        width: '95%',
        height: 350,
    },
    img: {
        height:300,
        width: 350,
    },
    mainTextContainer: {
        backgroundColor:'white',
        borderRadius:20,
        alignContent: 'center',
        alignSelf: 'center', 
        paddingTop:30,
        paddingHorizontal: 20,
        width: '95%',
        height: 400,
    },
    shapeTextContainer: {
        alignContent: 'center',
    },
    description: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        alignItems: 'center',
    },
    

})
export default Shop1;
